Common.Highlight.Common.Text: All Lots are part of a newly created TIF District. Proposed TIF 7 Plan Budget Items include: land acquisition and relocation, site preparation utility improvements, professional services expenses,  job training.

Fiber Connection include: IP Transit (DWDM) - 100 Mbps to 100 Gbps, IP Bandwidth - 100 Mbps to 10 Gbps, Fiber Ring for path redundancy, Lit Fiber and Dark Fiber, aggressive pricing compared to Comcast and AT&T
Wireless connection options include symmetrical, data radio links up to 1 Gbps
Internet service: IPv6 and IPv4 /23 to /30 Blocks

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: OnLight Aurora is a highly reliable optical fiber network that offers symmetrical Internet bandwidth from several Internet backbones over 100% under-ground fiber. OnLight Aurora also provides IP Transit to several data centers in the Chicagoland area which include CyrusOne and ByteGrid in Aurora, New Continuum in West Chicago, and Digital Realty (350 East Cermak) in Chicago.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: High Speed Optical Fiber Connection Available
